content: Thank you for sharing this David. Here is my take on this. Making mistakes is key to build your instincts. Because the fact of making these mistakes is what in return will strengthen your abilities to have more sharpened instincts. Therefore making mistakes is a vital part of the human experience needed to be more accurate with our instincts. Although learning from others is important to realize the power of listening and focusing more on our instincts, nothing can really replace the experience of making mistakes.
